text: Hello Food Tube! My name is Amber Kelley from Cook With Amber.

I love to share. I am making a healthy
breakfast granola.

I love this in the morning with some
almond milk because it's perfect. It gives you the
nutrients, the energy you need throughout the day.

It's got nuts, seeds and dried fruits so it's
really healthy,
and the best part - it is really easy. I am making this

in honour of Food Revolution Day. If you
don't know what that is

it's a day where the entire world get a
chance to raise awareness

on how important it is for kids to
learn about food. Don't you think that's
important? Cos I do.
Let's get started. Here are the ingredients that you'll need.

The first step is to take your nuts and

and roughly chop them up. So for example we've got walnuts, cashews

bones, and hazlenuts.
Now we're going to add

actually like rebuild muscle. So like this would be a great snack to have after the gym if

that was really cool.
Next I'm adding in my oats and pumpkin pie spice.

they're
golden brown.
